name: expositor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who explains or describes something, especially complicated ideas: He regarded himself primarily as an expositor and defender of Platonic philosophy.
More examplesFewer examplesHe is arguably the most influential contemporary expositor of modern science.Watt has long been acknowledged to be among the finest and most learned of Conrad's expositors. He used his well-known ethics course partly to develop his own ideas, but was most noted as a critic and expositor. Alf van der Poorten is one of Australia's leading expositors on number theory.
